## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (68e086dd1c0ed95fee2947b3db1b076846e476e3766db5e6f559e5fd4be456e3)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'calculated_members_message' @ 1.1.8 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
